g.text: registerProduct(productCategory, shortDescription, extendedDescription, technicalDescription, brandName, reference, priceWithoutTaxes, weight, volume, tax, optionalProductionCode, photo, status)
newProduct = create(productCategory, shortDescription, extendedDescription, technicalDescription, brandName, reference, priceWithoutTaxes, weight, volume, tax, optionalProductionCode, photo, status)
informs of operation success or fail
